process_model.name: AS GSS DRM Reconcile Vendor
process_model.description: The process model to Reconcile vendor data  from GSS to GSM

outputs.output_expression:
recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD(
  recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedBy: pp!initiator,
  recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedOn: pp!starttime,
  recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive: true,
  recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.currentIterationCount: pv!iterationInfo.currentIterationCount,
  recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.totalIterationCount: pv!iterationInfo.totalIterationCount,
  recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.parentReconId: if(
    pv!iterationInfo.currentIterationCount = 1,
    null,
    pv!parentReconciliationId
  ),
  recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.createdCount: 0,
  recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.skippedCount: 0,
  recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.gsmReconciliationId: index(ac!Result.body, "reconciliationId", null),
  recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.status: index(ac!Result, "statusCode", null),
  recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.message: index(ac!Result.body, "message", null),
  recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.completedOn: if(
    or(
      index(ac!Result, "statusCode", null) = cons!AS_GSS_DRM_INT_DATA_RECONCILIATION_ERROR_CODE_409,
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
        index(ac!Result.body, "reconciliationId", null)
      )
    ),
    now(),
    null
  )
)

rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
  records: pv!reconciliationDetails,
  modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD(
    recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.status: index(pv!result, "statusCode", null),
    recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.message: index(pv!result.body, "message", null)
  )
)

nodes.node_name: Update  Vendor Count and  Ref vendor status

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse
expression_rules.description: Default a null value to false, otherwise returns the boolean value

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QR_getReferenceVendors
expression_rules.description: Returns reference vendors synced record based on the given filter set

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!vendorRefId
    ),
    if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(boolean: ri!fetchAll),
      {},
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
        operator: "=",
        value: true()
      )
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!vendorRefId
    ),
    if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(boolean: ri!fetchAll),
      {},
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
        operator: "=",
        value: true()
      )
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
expression_rules.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

test_cases.test_name: Array cast to Any Type with first value null

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord
expression_rules.description: Given a model record, updates the provided records' fields to match those of the model record.  Nulls apply if the field exists in the model record.

test_cases.test_name: Update multiple fields, multiple records with other fields

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper
expression_rules.description: This rule returns a boolean which represents whether or not State and Local is enabled

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord
expression_rules.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

record_types.name: AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD
record_types.description: The table to hold information related to reconciliation requests to GSM

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Reconciliation Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationId,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: if(
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationId] < 100000,
              text(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationId],
                "#00000"
              ),
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.reconciliationId]
            ),
            link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
              recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD,
              identifier: fv!identifier
            ),
            linkStyle: "STANDALONE"
          )
        }
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Gsm Reconciliation Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.gsmReconciliationId,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.gsmReconciliationId],
      ""
    ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Status",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.status,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.status],
      ""
    )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Message",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.message,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.message],
      ""
    )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Current Iteration Count",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.currentIterationCount,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[ recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.currentIterationCount],
      0
    ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created Count",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.createdCount,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.createdCount],
      ""
    ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Skipped Count",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.skippedCount,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.skippedCount],
      ""
    ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Parent Recon Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.parentReconId,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.parentReconId],
      ""
    ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Started By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedBy,
      value: a!defaultValue(
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedBy],
      ""
    )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Started On",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedOn,
      value: if(
        isnull(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedOn]
        ),
        "",
        datetext(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedOn],
          "default"
        )
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Completed On",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.completedOn,
      value: if(
        isnull(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.completedOn]
        ),
        "",
        datetext(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.completedOn],
          "default"
        )
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Active",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: if(
        isnull(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]
        ),
        "",
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          value: if(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_ReconciliationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "check",
              altText: "Yes",
              color: "#138901"
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "times",
              altText: "No",
              color: "SECONDARY"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      align: "CENTER"
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  borderStyle: "LIGHT",
  shadeAlternateRows: false
)

record_types.name: AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD
record_types.description: DEPRECATED IN GSS 2.5 - Synced Record for Ref Vendor (This record is only used for vendor migration in 2.5)

fields.display_name: Reconciliation And Migration Status For Federal
Reconciliation And Migration Status For SLG

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  emptyGridMessage: "No vendors available",
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_isActive(
        isActive: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]
      ),
      align: "CENTER",
      width: "ICON"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Name",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: {
          rule!AS_CO_DSP_primaryRecordListField(
            recordTitle: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName],
            recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
            recordIdentifier: fv!identifier
          )
        }
      ),
      width: "MEDIUM"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "UEI",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId,
      helpTooltip: "Unique Entity Identifier",
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId]
        ),
        "-",
        fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId]
      ),
      width: "AUTO"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "DUNS",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.duns,
      helpTooltip:
      "Data Universal Numbering System",
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.duns]
        ),
        "-",
        fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.duns]
      ),
      width: "AUTO"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "CAGE",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode,
      helpTooltip:
      "Commercial and Government Entity Code",
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode]
        ),
        "-",
        fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode]
      ),
      width: "NARROW"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Status",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
        nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status],
        replacementValue: "-"
      ),
      width: "NARROW"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Business Type",
      value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_businessType(
        businessType: {},
        businessTypeRecord: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.refVendorBusinessTypes]
      ),
      width: "MEDIUM_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Address",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1]
          ),
          "-",
          rule!AS_GAM_UT_displayAddressAsEnvelope(
            addressLine1: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1],
            addressLine2: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine2],
            state: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.state.stateName],
            city: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity],
            zipCode: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode],
            zipCodeExt: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt],
            foreignPostalCode: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode],
            country: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.countryName],
            countryId: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.countryId]
          )
        )
      ),
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Expiration Date",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
        nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate],
        replacementValue: "-"
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    )
  },
  pageSize: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM_LARGE,
  initialSorts: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName,
      ascending: true
    )
  },
  spacing: "STANDARD",
  borderStyle: "LIGHT",
  shadeAlternateRows: true
)

actions.target_uuid: AS GSS Sync Vendor From SAM.GOV

constants.name: AS_GSS_DRM_INT_REF_ID_RECONCILIATION_STATUS_SKIPPED
constants.description: Holds the ref id that indicates the migration status: Skipped

constants.name: AS_GSS_DRM_INT_MAX_RETRY_COUNT
constants.description:
maximum retry count for integration to execute
value:2

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
constants.description: OBJECT_ARRAY - Returns an array type of the CDT when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

constants.name: AS_GSS_DRM_INT_REF_ID_RECONCILIATION_STATUS_PROCESSED
constants.description: Holds the ref id that indicates the migration status: Processed
